content:
Q: Will exams remain online for the duration of 2024/2025?
A: Exams will continue to be held online for the foreseeable future, including Summer exams. There are limited exceptions to this for certain programmes. If your programme is an exception, you will be informed of this during the academic year.

metadata.source_file: FAQs from Students at Dublin Business School.pdf
metadata.question: Will exams remain online for the duration of 2024/2025?
